entry.title: Wednesday: Increasing cloudiness. High plus 2.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this evening and after midnight. Rain showers beginning after midnight. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Fog patches overnight. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 15 February 2023
